org.mindroid.api.robot.context

Interface IConstraintEvaluator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RobotContextStateEvaluator

    public interface IConstraintEvaluator
    Created by torben on 11.03.2017.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleRobotContextState(IRobotContextState rcs) 
      void subscribeConstraints(ISatisfiedConstraintHandler listener, java.lang.String statemachine_id, java.util.List<IConstraint> constraints)

    • Method Detail

      • handleRobotContextState

        void handleRobotContextState(IRobotContextState rcs)
        Parameters:
        rcs - robot context state object to handle

      • subscribeConstraints

        void subscribeConstraints(ISatisfiedConstraintHandler listener,
                          java.lang.String statemachine_id,
                          java.util.List<IConstraint> constraints)
        Subscribe the contstaints to the Evaluator. Subscribed constraints will be evaluated in respect to the RobotContextState
        Parameters:
        listener - - gets called if the Evaluator found a satisfied Constraint
        statemachine_id - - id of the statemachine the constraints belong to
        constraints - - the Constraints to subscribe

      • unsubscribeConstraints

        void unsubscribeConstraints(java.lang.String statemachineId)
        Unsubscribes Constraints from the Evaluator. The Constraints wont be evaluated anymore.
        Parameters:
        statemachineId - statemachine id
